name: Install Package
description: Install a package into a space. Creates schemas, registers package in space.json, and makes agents/workflows available.

space_id.description: Space to install package into (defaults to current space)

auto_install_schemas.description: Whether to automatically create schemas/tables from package

enabled_agents.description: Specific agents to enable (defaults to all)

enabled_workflows.description: Specific workflows to enable (defaults to all)
